column1: Sterling Brown, who was jobless until a bucks assistant called Stephen Silas to tell him to give him a shot is averaging 8.5pts/3.2Rbds/1Ast/1Stl on 52/46/100 on 20mpg off the Houston Bench
[Highlight] AD absolutely denies Sterling Brown at the rim
[Dubose] Rockets starting lineup tonight: Sterling Brown, Ben McLemore, Jae'Sean Tate, PJ Tucker, and Christian Wood
[Dubose] Rockets starting lineup tonight: Sterling Brown, Ben McLemore, Jae'Sean Tate, PJ Tucker, and Christian Wood
[Highlight] Sterling Brown tries to dunk it on AD but gets stuffed
[Fischer] NBA Executives Anticipate Houston Rockets 'Fire Sale' at the Trade Deadline: Victor Oladipo, P.J. Tucker, Danuel House Jr., Ben McLemore, Sterling Brown and Jae'Sean Tate
[DuBose] John Wall will not play tonight (left knee effusion). Kevin Porter Jr., Sterling Brown, Danuel House Jr., Jae'Sean Tate, and Christian Wood will start in Brooklyn.

The Houston Rockets roster for tonight: KPJ (2nd year), Mason Jones (rookie), Jae'Sean Tate (rookie), Justin Patton (effectively a rookie), KJ Martin Jr (rookie), Anthony Lamb (rookie), Sterling Brown (25 y/o), Ben McLemore (28 y/o)

[Charania] Sterling Brown entered the wrong sprinter van on his way out of the club and had a heated exchange of words with three or more individuals. It escalated into all of those individuals jumping Brown, physically beating him up, hitting him in with a bottle

[Slater] Rockets’ Sterling Brown shown full of blood in body-cam video outside Miami strip club. His teammate, Kevin Porter Jr., and cops appear to have an animated discussion before Brown gets treatment from paramedics. (Note: Audio muted by police)

[Stein] The NBA has fined Houston’s Kevin Porter Jr. $50,000 since he was out with Sterling Brown when Brown was recently assaulted at a Miami club. League rules prohibit attending “indoor social gatherings of 15 or more people or entering bars, lounges, clubs or similar establishments.”

[The athletic] Details of what happened to Sterling Brown in Miami on Monday were more dire than originally stated, sources tell @ShamsCharania & @KellyIkoNBA. "If he hadn’t been as physically strong and tough, he might not have made it. ... He could have died."
What happened on the night Sterling Brown got jumped in Miami? Here's what we know (from the Athletic)
"Rockets' Sterling Brown Victim of Assault on Sunday, Suffered Facial Injuries"

Sterling Brown's teammates reportedly feared for his life after strip club attack: 'He could have died' said sources close to Brown who were worried for his life after a late-night assault outside a club called the Booby Trap.

According to Tim Reynolds, “Miami-Dade Police say the Rockets' Sterling Brown had "multiple lacerations throughout his body" when they arrived at a strip club in response to a fight at 6:53 a.m. Monday. He was taken to Jackson Memorial, police say.”

[Charania] Rockets‘ Kevin Porter Jr. will be sidelined until Sunday due to health and safety protocols, coach Stephen Silas says. Rockets guard Kevin Porter Jr. stepped into the altercation involving Sterling Brown in Miami on Monday as a way to protect Brown.
Iko- What happened on the night Sterling Brown got jumped in Miami? Here’s what we know

[MacMahon] Rockets statement: “Last night, Sterling Brown was the victim of an assault. He had no prior knowledge of or interaction with the assailants. He suffered facial lacerations but will make a full recovery. Sterling is not playing tonight because of his prior knee injury.”

[Charania] Rockets‘ Kevin Porter Jr. will be sidelined until Sunday due to health and safety protocols, coach Stephen Silas says. Porter Jr. stepped into the altercation involving Sterling Brown in Miami on Monday as a way to protect Brown.

Sterling Brown incident body cam footage (blood warning)

[DuBose] #Rockets coach Stephen Silas says he spoke with Sterling Brown today, and he's doing better. "Thankfully, he's going to be okay." Brown is with the team on its road trip, so the assault seemingly occurred in Florida.
[The Athletic] Sterling Brown was jumped at a club late Sunday in Miami and was hit over the head with a bottle that needed medical attention over Monday. Brown is expected to make a full recovery

[The Athletic] Sterling Brown was jumped outside of a club in Miami late Sunday night, hit in the head with a bottle and needed medical attention into Monday, sources tell The Athletic. Multiple sources with knowledge of the incident said it was a serious altercation.
Sterling Brown Assault was in fact an altercation outside of a night Club in Miami

[Leung] Sterling Brown awarded $750,000 in a settlement with the city of Milwaukee regarding his lawsuit alleging he was the victim of police brutality

[Jake Kemp] 117 players took at least 150 catch-and-shoot attempts last year. the mavs retained THJ (23, by PPP) and signed sterling brown (30) and reggie bullock (35). maxi finished the year ranked 13th.
[Schultz] Sterling Brown has agreed to a two-year deal with the Mavericks, per league sources.

[Charania] Free agent Sterling Brown has agreed to a deal with the Dallas Mavericks, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.

[MacMahon] Sterling Brown has agreed to a 2-year deal with the Mavs, per source. Went to college in Dallas at SMU and started NBA career playing for Jason Kidd in Milwaukee. 3-and-D guy who shot 42.3% from deep for Rockets last season.
